    Join us now, see below for details ... ALWAYS READ THIS NFO

    Game Notes:
    ~~~~~~~~~~~

    They called it 'The Mighty Eighth' - the US Army's 8th Airforce flying
    daylight missions over the dangerous skies of Europe to strike at
    strategic military targets. B-17 Flying Fortress 'The Mighty Eighth'
    grabs all the latest revolutionary 3D graphics technology to recreate
    that period and let you take control.
    
    You've got total control. Command one B-17 or a squadron of twelve in
    full battle formation, look after 10 or 120 crewmen and jump into the
    shoes of any one of them. Plan strategic missions based on
    reconnaissance you have requested; fly in the escort planes or even the
    Luftwaffe fighters who are trying to shoot the B-17s down! All the
    action takes place in the most realistic and stunning 3D world ever
    created, featuring jaw-dropping graphic detail that allows you to zoom
    right down to ground level across the entire war zone of northern
    Europe. Targets are not just distant blocks seen from 20,000 feet they
    are fully viewable (zoom in and rotate around them) and will sustain
    realistic damage depending on how accurately you bomb them.
    
    And, if it's a B-17 flight sim you want B-17 Flying Fortress 'The Mighty
    Eighth' has it all! All the switches, working instruments and levers
    complete and fully functioning. If it's in the real bomber, it'll be
    there. Taxi, take off, cruise, and land. Perform all pilot's checklist
    duties, from adjusting the cowl flaps to increasing the manifold
    pressure. But if you simply want pure shooting action you can man one of
    the seven gun positions and the computer AI will take care of the rest!

    Find more info under http://www.b17flyingfortress.com


    Ripped Notes:
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~

    CD-Audio-Tracks, movies, some cutscenes/animations, some speech and the
    foreign language files. Expect no addons.

    1. Unzip.
    2. Unace either manually or use our installer.
    3. Run Setup.bat to decompress the game-files.
    4. Import (doubleclick) b17.reg to your registry.
    5. Start B17Setup.exe to configure your hardware (do not select any
       other language but English).
    6. Start the game with Game.exe.
